title: Australian diary. No. 049
creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: Magazine items: Archery proves great sport for war veterans; “SS Borda” completed at the Brisbane ship-building yards; Melbourne girl, Anne Fraser, creates her own Little Theatre; New Guinea natives follow noble calling. Narrated by Harry Dearth.
creator_credit_for_label: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
